short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds button to a Youtube video's playbar, that will remove it from all playlists

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For Youtube videos, provides single a click to remove the video from all of your playlists.

Three buttons are added to the right side of the play bar:

* star - to like and unplaylists the video
* minus - to unplaylists the video
* plus - open the playlist.
